short_summary: Construction of a new accessible beach access boardwalk
description: The purpose of this project is to construct a new accessible beach access boardwalk to get visitors to the beach from the Stanhope Main Beach Complex. Included in the project is an elevated boardwalk that leads to the beach, shower and foot wash station, stairs, accessible ramps to the beach, removal of infrastructure, relocation of playground, modifications of the existing beach complex, earthworks, and restoration. TWO STAGE SELECTION PROCESS. PRE-QUALIFIED CONTRACTORS ONLY.
duration_in_months: It remains unspecified in the provided data. Must obtained separately.
full_summary:
### Stage 2 - Stanhope Main Beach Access Upgrades – Prince Edward Island National Park

#### Request for Proposal (RFP) # 5P468-23-0190/A-001

#### Tender Overview

Parks Canada invites eligible contractors to submit a proposal for the `Stage 2 - Stanhope Main Beach Access Upgrades’ project. The purpose of this project is to construct a new accessible beach access boardwalk connecting the Stanhope Main Beach Complex to the beach.

#### Scope of Work

The scope of work includes:

*   Constructing an elevated boardwalk that leads to the beach
*   Installing a shower and foot wash station
*   Building stairs and accessible ramps to the beach
*   Removing existing infrastructure and relocating the playground
*   Modifying the existing beach complex to improve accessibility
*   Carrying out earthworks and restoration activities
*   Providing a comprehensive plan and implementation strategy

#### Two-Stage Process

This tender announcement is the second stage of a two-stage selection process. The first stage evaluated the qualifications of all interested suppliers. For this stage, qualified suppliers are invited to submit a financial bid based on the project specifications and drawings.

#### Key Tender Requirements

•   **Notice Number**: 5P468-23-0190/A-001
•   **Publication Date**: 2023-10-19
•   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-11-02T13:00:00
•   **Contract Start Date**: To be determined
•   **Contract End Date**: To be determined
•   **Procurement Category**: Construction and Infrastructure Services
•   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
•   **No GSCC appended to tender**
•   **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada, Prince Edward Island
•   **Regions of Delivery**: Canada, Prince Edward Island

#### Contact Information

You can reach out to Annik Piché at [annik.piche@pc.gc.ca](mailto:annik.piche@pc.gc.ca) or (581) 398-3489 for any queries related to this tender.

#### Attachments

Please click the links below for more information about the tender:

*   Invitation to Qualify
*   Project Specifications and Drawings
*   Appendix 2: Example Invitation to Tender

Note that the attachments are only available in PDF format.

#### Limitations of Trademark or Copyright

Applying for this project implies your acceptance of the conditions
